    Function reference

    All functions

    .form_event_map()
    Safely extract the form-event map from an rcm_data object
    .html_to_cli()
    Translate HTML for Display with the `cli` Package
    .metadata()
    Safely extract metadata from an rcm_data object
    hello()
    Hello, World!
    rcm()
    REDCap Metadata Utilities
    rcm_annotation()
    Extract the REDCap Field Annotation
    rcm_arms_by_event()
    List REDCap arms given an event.
    rcm_arms_by_form()
    List REDCap arm given an instrument name.
    rcm_branching()
    Extract the REDCap Branching Logic
    rcm_choices()
    Extract the REDCap Choices or Calculations
    rcm_events()
    Extract the REDCap events at which the field's form is present
    rcm_events_by_arm()
    List REDCap events given an arm.
    rcm_events_by_form()
    List REDCap events given an instrument name.
    rcm_field()
    Extract the REDCap Field Name
    rcm_fields_by_arm()
    List REDCap fields given an arm.
    rcm_fields_by_event()
    List REDCap fields given an event.
    rcm_fields_by_form()
    List REDCap fields given an instrument name.
    rcm_form()
    Extract the REDCap Instrument Name
    rcm_forms_by_arm()
    List REDCap instruments given an arm.
    rcm_forms_by_event()
    List REDCap instruments given an event.
    rcm_forms_by_field()
    List REDCap instruments given a REDCap field.
    rcm_identifier()
    Extract the REDCap Identifier Status
    rcm_label()
    Extract the REDCap Field Label
    rcm_list_forms()
    Extract the List of REDCap Instruments from the Data Dictionary
    rcm_max()
    Extract the REDCap Validation Maximum Value
    rcm_metadata()
    Extract Metadata from an rcm_data Object
    rcm_min()
    Extract the REDCap Validation Minimum Value
    rcm_note()
    Extract the REDCap Field Note
    rcm_required()
    Extract the REDCap Required Status
    rcm_to_integer()
    Safely typecast REDCap fields to integer.
    rcm_to_logical()
    Safely typecast numerically coded yes/no and true/false questions to logical.
    rcm_to_numeric()
    Safely typecast REDCap fields to numeric
    rcm_to_time()
    Safely typecast date/time/datetime fields.
    rcm_type()
    Extract the REDCap Field Type
    rcm_validation()
    Extract the REDCap Text Validation
